segments.text: Excuse me , I ’ Ve been waiting my main dish for quite a time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes sir , just a minute , please . I ’ ll check with the kitchen . Thank you for waiting . It takes another 10 to 15 minutes , I ’ m afraid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have an appointment in half an hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have anything else I can have instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well sir , yes . How about this stew ? We can serve you at once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ ll take this stew then .
segments.speaker: S1
